ya10.3.3:2.1: puggalā → anāgāmī (csp1ed) | pajahissanti → pajahissati (csp1ed) | pañca → cattāro (csp1ed)
ya10.3.3:3.1: Āmantā → pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti aññindriyañca bhāvessanti (csp1ed)
ya10.3.3:5.1: Cha → cattāro (csp1ed) | puggalā → anāgāmī (csp1ed) | bhāvessanti → bhāvessati (csp1ed) | Tayo → cattāro (csp1ed)
ya10.3.3:6.1: Āmantā → cattāro puggalā domanassindriyañca pajahissanti aññindriyañca bhāvessanti (csp1ed)
ya10.3.3:7.1: Āmantā → tayo puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti (csp1ed)
ya10.3.3:8.1: Āmantā → cattāro puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti (csp1ed)
ya10.3.3:11.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī → tayo puggalā (csp1ed) | sacchikarissati → sacchikarissanti (csp1ed) | bhāvessati → bhāvessanti (csp1ed)
